patthana16.44:4.1: Ajjhattaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabahiddhā nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.44:4.2: Bahiddhā hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhatto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.44:5.1: Ajjhattaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabahiddhā nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.44:5.2: Bahiddhā nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhatto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
